burlap.domain.stochasticgames.gridgame

Class GridGame.GGJointRewardFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.stochasticgames.gridgame.GridGame.GGJointRewardFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JointRewardFunction
    Enclosing class:
    GridGame

    public static class GridGame.GGJointRewardFunction
extends Object
implements JointRewardFunction
    Specifies goal rewards and default rewards for agents. Defaults rewards to 0 reward everywhere except transition to unviersal or personal goals which return a reward 1.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain)
      Initializes for a given domain.

      Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward and goal reward.
      GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain, double stepCost, double universalGoalReward, boolean noopIncursStepCost, Map<Integer,Double> personalGoalRewards)
      Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward, universal goal reward, and unique personal goal reward for each player.
      GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain, double stepCost, double personalGoalReward, double universalGoalReward, boolean noopIncursStepCost)
      Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward, personal goal reward, and universal goal reward.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GGJointRewardFunction

        public GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain)
        Initializes for a given domain. Defaults rewards to 0 reward everywhere except transition to unviersal or personal goals which return a reward 1.
        Parameters:
        ggDomain - the domain

      • GGJointRewardFunction

        public GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain,
                             double stepCost,
                             double goalReward,
                             boolean noopIncursStepCost)
        Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward and goal reward.
        Parameters:
        ggDomain - the domain
        stepCost - the reward returned for all transitions except transtions to goal locations
        goalReward - the reward returned for transitioning to a personal or universal goal
        noopIncursStepCost - if true, then noop actions also incur the stepCost reward; if false, then noops always return 0 reward.

      • GGJointRewardFunction

        public GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain,
                             double stepCost,
                             double personalGoalReward,
                             double universalGoalReward,
                             boolean noopIncursStepCost)
        Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward, personal goal reward, and universal goal reward.
        Parameters:
        ggDomain - the domain
        stepCost - the reward returned for all transitions except transtions to goal locations
        personalGoalReward - the reward returned for transitions to a personal goal
        universalGoalReward - the reward returned for transitions to a universal goal
        noopIncursStepCost - if true, then noop actions also incur the stepCost reward; if false, then noops always return 0 reward.

      • GGJointRewardFunction

        public GGJointRewardFunction(OODomain ggDomain,
                             double stepCost,
                             double universalGoalReward,
                             boolean noopIncursStepCost,
                             Map<Integer,Double> personalGoalRewards)
        Initializes for a given domain, step cost reward, universal goal reward, and unique personal goal reward for each player.
        Parameters:
        ggDomain - the domain
        stepCost - the reward returned for all transitions except transtions to goal locations
        universalGoalReward - the reward returned for transitions to a universal goal
        noopIncursStepCost - if true, then noop actions also incur the stepCost reward; if false, then noops always return 0 reward.
        personalGoalRewards - a map from player numbers to their personal goal reward (the first player number is 0)

    • Method Detail

      • reward

        public double[] reward(State s,
                       JointAction ja,
                       State sp)
        Description copied from interface: JointRewardFunction
        Returns the reward received by each agent specified in the joint action.
        Specified by:
        reward in interface JointRewardFunction
        Parameters:
        s - that state in which the joint action was taken.
        ja - the joint action taken.
        sp - the resulting state from taking the joint action
        Returns:
        a Map from agent names to the reward that they received.

      • defaultCost

        protected double defaultCost(int aid,
                             JointAction ja)
        Returns a default cost for an agent assuming the agent didn't transition to a goal state. If noops incur step cost, then this is always the step cost. If noops do not incur step costs and the agent took a noop, then 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        aid - the agent of interest
        ja - the joint action set
        Returns:
        the default reward; either step cost or 0.

      • getPersonalGoalReward

        protected double getPersonalGoalReward(OOState s,
                                       String agentName)
        Returns the personal goal rewards. If a single common personal goal reward was set then that is returned. If different personal goal rewards were defined for each player number, then that is queried and returned instead.
        Parameters:
        s - the state in which the agent player numbers are defined
        agentName - the agent name for which the person goal reward is to be returned
        Returns:
        the personal goal reward for the specified agent.
